node.title: COVID vaccine bookings leap in the NT following lockdown announcement
node.alt: A blue sign reads "COVID-19 vaccination centre" outside a white building
node.description: COVID-19 vaccine bookings in the Northern Territory have surged since lockout and lockdown restrictions were introduced in Greater Darwin and Katherine, according to new figures.
node.content:
["COVID-19 vaccine bookings in the Northern Territory have surged since\u00a0lockout and\u00a0lockdown restrictions were introduced in\u00a0Greater Darwin and Katherine, according to new figures.\u00a0", "NT Chief Minister Michael Gunner announced the\u00a0measures in an emergency\u00a0press conference on Thursday night after an unvaccinated man was confirmed to be COVID-positive.\u00a0", "The next day, vaccination bookings spiked.", "Federal health data shows 2.36 per cent of the NT population lined up to\u00a0receive either their first or second vaccine dose on Friday.\u00a0", "According to the data, about 2,220 people rolled up their sleeve to receive their first dose on Friday, compared to 917 the previous day.", "The fresh demand saw growth in first-dose coverage increase\u00a0by 1.16 per cent, outstripping every other state and territory.", "", "The data also shows about 2,110 people received their second dose on Friday, compared to 914 the day before.", "", "Saturday's vaccine booking numbers were\u00a0higher than usual, with 936 people receiving their first dose compared to the same time last week, when 277 people received their first dose.", "During a COVID press conference on Monday, Mr Gunner said \"it's been an absolutely outstanding response\".\u00a0", "\"I think the only day that beat it for bookings was the very first day that we made bookings available,\" he said.", "\"So it's quite an extraordinary response from Territorians.\"", "A significant\u00a0leap in vaccinations also occurred in mid-October, after\u00a0the NT government\u00a0issued a legal direction mandating workers in a broad range of\u00a0settings receive their\u00a0COVID-19 vaccine within a month.", "In the 24 hours that followed, bookings jumped by 303 per cent.", "According to NT government data, the Territory's double-dose vaccination rate is at 76 per cent, and 89 per cent first dose.\u00a0", "Mr Gunner has used daily COVID update press conferences during the lockout and lockdown to urge vaccine uptake across the Northern Territory.", "\"The higher the vaccination rate, the lower the hospitalisations, and deaths,\" he said on Monday.", "The opposition on Monday criticised the\u00a0Chief Minister's messaging surrounding the vaccine mandate, equating his\u00a0leadership to that of a \"dictator\".", "Protesters at recent\u00a0anti-vaccine and anti-mandate demonstrations\u00a0in Darwin have attacked Mr Gunner's vaccine mandate as government overreach.", "\"He goes around calling people idiots, and calling [them anti-vaxxers],\"\u00a0Deputy Opposition Leader Gerard Maley, who says he supports the vaccine mandate,\u00a0told ABC Radio Darwin on Monday\u00a0morning.", "\"I know the Opposition [recently] asked a number of questions in parliament about the health system and Mr Gunner got very agitated.", "\"So, in my understanding, that's what dictators do.\"", "Mr Maley also said confusion around the rules of the current lockout in Greater Darwin and Katherine\u00a0was a further example of the Chief Minister's\u00a0undemocratic leadership.", "\"It also shows that Michael Gunner, the dictator that he is, goes out and makes these implementation plans, and doesn't have a plan to enforce them,\" he said.", "", "
How to take a rapid antigen test
"]
